img.title: welcome
img.style: top: 109px; width: 216px; height: 105px; left: 158px; text-align: center;

span.style: text-decoration-line: underline; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

strong.span: Winona ISD would like to welcome you to our school website! Feel free to explore the web space by checking out some of our features including: calendars, news, and blogs. Subscribe to our Facebook, Twitter, or RSS feeds to receive updates on school and district information!

p.span: For more helpful Covid-19 information, please click on our news tab and go to the Coronavirus subtab.

a.title: Winona ISD District of Innovation Plan

div.a: Winona ISD District of Innovation Plan
div.div: Our vision is to create a school district that has a positive impact on student's lives forever. Click here to view our district's new innovation plan.

a.title: Winona ISD Federal Report Cards - TEA

div.a: Winona ISD Federal Report Cards - TEA
div.div: TEA has posted the 2017-2018 Federal Report Cards for our District.

As part of Texas Education Code (TEC) 39A.103(2), 39A.104(a), and 39A.105(4) and as outlined in Texas Administrative Code (TAC) 19 TAC §97.1064(d) and (e), Winona Elementary is required to make public their Campus Turnaround Plan.
Check out next year's school calendar here!
Check out registration details for the new school year!

div.p: Winona Independent School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, or disability in admission to its programs, services, or activities, in access to them, in treatment of individuals, or in any aspect of their operations. Winona Independent School District also does not discriminate in its hiring or employment practices.
